install_msg:
## Thanks for installing!

This is a cog co-engineered between the BeeHive team and community members. If you have any issues with it, please open an issue via GitHub, or create a ticket [here](<https://www.beehive.systems/support>).

Looking for a security-minded Discord server? You're welcome to join ours <3
https://discord.gg/X8huyaeXrA
name: VirusTotal
short: Analyze files via Discord for malicious content
